qa.name: Zara
qa.appearance: Colorful hair, tattoos, and paint-stained clothes
qa.clothing: Baggy jeans and a crop top

hf.name: Marcus
hf.appearance: Tall with curly hair and glasses

tr.name: Officer Rodriguez
tr.appearance: Stern face with a hint of empathy

json_to_edit.voice_over: In a city of oppression, art became the spark of revolution.
json_to_edit.description: Zara's provocative graffiti ignites a movement against corruption.
json_to_edit.lighting: Harsh street lights and neon signs
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Traffic, distant sirens, spray paint hiss
json_to_edit.name: The Art of Rebellion
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A street artist's graffiti inspires a revolution against corrupt city officials.

qa.action: Zara approaches a large, blank wall in the bustling city center at night.

hf.action: Zara's determined eyes as she begins to paint her masterpiece.

tr.action: The graffiti takes shape, revealing a powerful image of citizens breaking free from chains.

xc.action: A crowd gathers, including Marcus, to admire the finished mural.

ka.action: Officer Rodriguez arrives, conflicted about whether to arrest Zara.

fn.action: People in the crowd take photos of the mural, sharing them on social media.

af.action: Mayor Thompson arrives, furious at the display of rebellion.

qo.action: The crowd, led by Marcus, stands between Zara and the authorities, protecting the art and artist.

edit_command: Add three new shots showing the spread of the revolution across the city, inspired by Zara's mural.

updated_json.voice_over: In a city of oppression, art became the spark of revolution.
updated_json.description: Zara's provocative graffiti ignites a movement against corruption.
updated_json.lighting: Harsh street lights and neon signs
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Traffic, distant sirens, spray paint hiss
updated_json.name: The Art of Rebellion
updated_json.scene_summary: A street artist's graffiti inspires a revolution against corrupt city officials.

qa.action: Zara approaches a large, blank wall in the bustling city center at night.

hf.action: Zara's determined eyes as she begins to paint her masterpiece.

tr.action: The graffiti takes shape, revealing a powerful image of citizens breaking free from chains.

xc.action: A crowd gathers, including Marcus, to admire the finished mural.

ka.action: Officer Rodriguez arrives, conflicted about whether to arrest Zara.

fn.action: People in the crowd take photos of the mural, sharing them on social media.

af.action: Mayor Thompson arrives, furious at the display of rebellion.

qo.action: The crowd, led by Marcus, stands between Zara and the authorities, protecting the art and artist.

bx.action: A bird's-eye view of the city shows multiple gatherings forming around new murals inspired by Zara's art.

yz.action: Quick cuts of various artists creating new murals across the city, each depicting themes of rebellion and freedom.

lm.action: A massive protest forms in the city square, with Zara's original mural visible in the background as a symbol of the revolution.

label.rationale: we will add three new shots to the scene to show the spread of the revolution across the city, inspired by zara's mural. these shots will be placed after the existing shots to maintain the flow of the scene and demonstrate the impact of zara's artwork. we'll update the number_of_shots from 8 to 11 and add three new entries to the shots dictionary with appropriate actions and sfx_keywords. we'll also update the list_display_order to include the new shots.

value.action: A bird's-eye view of the city shows multiple gatherings forming around new murals inspired by Zara's art.
Quick cuts of various artists creating new murals across the city, each depicting themes of rebellion and freedom.
A massive protest forms in the city square, with Zara's original mural visible in the background as a symbol of the revolution.
